name: Deep Space Escape
description:
Intro

You are the crew of a spaceship venturing deeper and deeper into the galaxy. 

Your ship cannot slow down or stop, but you need to manage your crew's resources. Send shuttles to passing planets to gather vital resources as your ship relentlessly jumps between each star system progressing deeper and deeper through the galaxy.

(Eventually) You can probe and scan upcoming systems on the star map to determine your best route ahead, certain systems will only supply you certain with basic resources but are survivable, others are more dangerous but give bigger rewards. 

How to 'play'
  •  As you progress your people consume food
  •  When your food runs out people begin to die - they don't eat each other... I promise
  • When your people die, game is over
  • You can replenish food by sending shuttles to planets in each solar system
  • If your shuttles don't make it back to the ship before it jumps, the shuttle and people onboard are lost forever
  • You can make more shuttles from materials
  • You can extract more materials from planets

For more details visit my ludum-dare-48 submission page
